features: 【Glycolic Acid 7% Toner】This Glycolic Acid 7% Toner gently exfoliates and improves skin clarity. Continuous use can also improve the appearance of skin texture.
【Mild ingredients】This product contains plant essence. Therefore, it can promote dermal collagen synthesis.
【moisturizing effect】Moisturize, strengthen skin barrier, improve stains and acne, shrink pores, and gently exfoliate.
【Even skin tone 】This method gently reshapes the skin for a bright, even complexion and a smooth, soft texture.
【Suitable for skin】dry, oily, combined, mature skin.
【Note】Sensitive, peeling, damaged skin should not be used！
body.description: HOW TO USE: 1. First,clean the face. 2. Soak the cotton piece with our product , gently sweep the face skin , and avoid the parts around the eyes . This product is not suitable for sensitive,peeling or damaged skin. 3. Acid products will make skin more sensitive to ultravioletradiation . During the use of this product , please pay attention to sunscreen and try to avoid exposing your skin to the sun. PACKAGE INCLUDED: 1 Bottle * 240ml Notice： 1. Suitable for Skin Type：Dry skin , oily skin , mixed skin and mature skin. 2. This product is not suitable for sensitive,peeling or damaged skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: Tons of skin care products on the market these days. This one has been great, does what its advertised to do and has not irritated my mature skin or my daughters' teenage skin. We use it every other day with no irritations or problems. I especially like the amount you get for the price. I would definitely buy again and recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is a fake product. Scam.
reviews.reviewText: I was running low on this product I had bought from ulta originally. I’ve been using it everyday for years so I know how acidic it is supposed to feel on the skin.This product is something completely different than what it’s supposed to be. The color was slightly different I noticed at first. Then I smelled it, completely different smell. Then I put it on my face. Normally, this stuff usually makes my face and fingers sting bc that’s how acidic the product normally is. There was no stinging, in fact no acidity to the product at all. upon further examination, it seems like its water mixed with some other random yellow colored product. Complete scam.
